PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CoveringCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcCovering.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1')

PropertyDef.Name: FireRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire rating for this object. It is given according to the national fire safety classification.

PropertyDef.Name: AcousticRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Acoustic rating for this object. It is giving according to the national building code. It indicates the sound transmission resistance of this object by an index ration (instead of providing full sound absorbtion values).

PropertyDef.Name: FlammabilityRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Flammability Rating for this object. It is given according to the national building code that governs the rating of flammability for materials.

PropertyDef.Name: FragilityRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication on the fragility of the covering (e.g., under fire conditions). It is given according to the national building code that might provide a classification for fragility.

PropertyDef.Name: SurfaceSpreadOfFlame
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication on how the flames spread around the surface, It is given according to the national building code that governs the fire behaviour for materials.

PropertyDef.Name: Material
PropertyDef.Definition: Main material of the covering, it should only be given, if no IfcMaterial class is assigned to the IfcCovering instance.

PropertyDef.Name: Combustible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the object is made from combustible material (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: TotalThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: Thickness of the covering, The thickness information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the shape properties, provided in the attached property, the geometric parameters take precedence.

PropertyDef.Name: Finish
PropertyDef.Definition: Finish selection for this object. Here specification of the surface finish for informational purposes
